mapper.insert: insert into boardTbl(writeUser, writeDate, pNo, projectDate, text, budget, pm, status) values(#{writeUser}, #{writeDate}, #{pNo}, #{projectDate}, #{text}, #{budget}, #{pm}, #{status});
mapper.select:
select * from v_getBoard
where pName like CONCAT('%', #{keyword} , '%')
where pm like CONCAT('%', #{keyword} , '%')
order by bNo desc;

select group_concat((a.aMName)) as aMName, b.*, (select count(distinct tMName) as joinUser from v_tasktbl) as joinUser from v_getBoard b left outer join v_activitytbl a on b.bNo = a.bNo where b.bNo = #{bNo};
mapper.insert: insert into activityTbl(bNo, aName, aDate, aM, aText, aWriteD, aWriteU, aStatus) values(#{bNo}, #{aName}, #{aDate}, #{aM}, #{aText}, #{aWriteD}, #{aWriteU}, #{aStatus});
mapper.select: select * from v_activityTbl where bNo = #{bNo} order by aNo desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
select * from v_activityTbl where bNo = #{bNo} order by aNo desc;
select * from v_activityTbl where bNo = #{bNo} and aStatus = '진행중';
select * from v_activityTbl where bNo = #{bNo} and aStatus = '대기';
select * from v_activityTbl where bNo = #{bNo} and aStatus = '완료';
select * from v_activityTbl where bNo = #{bNo} and aStatus = '보류';
select b.*, g.* from v_getBoard b left outer join v_activityTbl g on b.bNo = g.bNo where aNo = #{aNo};
select * from v_getBoard where bNo > 0 order by bNo desc limit #{page}, 5;
select * from v_getBoard where bNo > 0 order by bNo desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
select count(bNo) from v_getBoard where bNo > 0;
select count(aNo) from v_activityTbl where aNo > 0 and bNo = #{bNo};
select count(*) from v_taskTbl where tNo > 0 and aNo = #{aNo};
mapper.insert: insert into taskTbl(aNo, bNo, tName, tDate, tStatus, tM, tText, tWriteD, tWriteU) values(#{aNo}, #{bNo}, #{tName}, #{tDate}, #{tStatus}, #{tM}, #{tText}, #{tWriteD}, #{tWriteU});
mapper.select: select * from v_taskTbl where aNo = #{aNo} and tNo > 0 order by tNo desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};

select b.*, g.*, t.*, round(w.wTimeM / 60) + sum(wTimeH) as wTimeH, mod(sum(wTimeM), 60) as wTimeM from v_getBoard b left outer join v_getactivityTbl g on b.bNo = g.bNo left outer join v_taskTbl t on g.aNo = t.aNo left outer join worklogtbl w on w.tNo = t.tNo where t.tNo = #{tNo};
select * from v_statusTbl where bNo = #{bNo};
select * from v_getTaskTbl where aNo = #{aNo} order by field(tStatus, '진행중', '보류', '대기', '완료');
select round(ongoing/total * 100) ongoing1, round(standby/total * 100) standby1, round(complete/total * 100) complete1, round(defer/total * 100) defer1 from v_statusTbl where bNo = #{bNo};

select aNo, tNo, tMPhoto, tMName, count(*) count, count(*) as total, COUNT(CASE WHEN tStatus = '진행중' THEN 1 END) ongoing, COUNT(CASE WHEN tStatus = '대기' THEN 1 END) standby, COUNT(CASE WHEN tStatus = '완료' THEN 1 END) complete, COUNT(CASE WHEN tStatus = '보류' THEN 1 END) defer from v_taskTbl where aNo=#{aNo} group by tMName order by count;
select count(distinct tMName) as joinUser from v_tasktbl;
mapper.insert: insert into worklogTbl (wDate, tNo, wText, wTimeH, wTimeM, wClient, wFileName, wWriteDate, wUser) values (#{wDate}, #{tNo}, #{wText}, #{wTimeH}, #{wTimeM}, #{wClient}, #{wFileName}, #{wWriteDate}, #{wUser});
mapper.select: select *, case dayofweek(w.wDate) when '1' then '일요일' when '2' then '월요일' when '3' then '화요일' when '4' then '수요일' when '5' then '목요일' when '6' then '금요일' when '7' then '토요일' end as day from worklogTbl w left outer join userTbl u on w.wUser = u.email where tNo =#{tNo} order by wDate desc
select distinct username from worklogTbl w left outer join userTbl u on w.wUser = u.email left outer join taskTbl t on t.tNo = w.tNo where w.tNo =#{tNo} and tm != email order by wDate desc;
select count(wNo) from worklogtbl where wNo > 0;
